billEvents.eventText: referred to consumer affairs and protection

title: Provides for the regulation of unsolicited circulars
summary: Provides for the regulation of unsolicited circulars; authorizes the governing body of any county or city in the state of New York to establish, by adoption of a local law, a registry for residents who wish to refuse the delivery of any handbill, circular or other printed matter of a commercial or business nature to their residence; makes related provisions.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the regulation of unsolicited circulars
